11.content:
My name is Marcus and I am 45 years old;
I want to use this story to review my life and play with the fantasy, how my life could have been if I were born a girl.
11.title: what if

choices: how this would look like as a girl version of me
111.content:
My early memories are when I was around 5 years old and on my last year in kindergarten. My best friends are Alexander and Martin. I often play with them in sandcasting and we have a lot of toys, mostly model cars like matchbox and action figures. Also, Lego is a good thing we play.
This weekend I meet my friend Alexander and we played at his place. His grandma is living with them and she likes me very much.
111.title: ok

1111.content:
So I would be a 5 year old girl named Sandra on my last year in kindergarten. My best friends are Daniela and Bianca. I often play with them in sandcasting and we have a lot of toys, mostly dolls like barbie figures.


This weekend I meet my friend Daniela and we played at her place. Her parents like me very much.
1111.title: how this would look like as a girl version of me

11111.content:
time went by and I was now in primary school
The time I was in primary school Star Trek, the original series was aired and popular. My parents especially my Dad allowed me to watch it even it might not suitable for a 6 year old girl. I was pretty much a fan of Captain Kirk.
In school in our breaks some boys, who are also allowed to watch this show were playing some of the characters of Star Trek. It was kind of cosplay but of course at that age nobody had costumes or make up, we were kids…. I was one of them.
Since I was a natural blonde I was shipman Janice Rent. I imagined myself wearing one of the short skirt uniforms, but most properly I was to young to see how sexy they could be on girls…
Our Captain Kirk leading the team through space and final frontiers where no man or kid has gone before. It was one guy from my class, named Rick. The role for Mr. Spok we had not installed, because for some reason nobody was able or wanted to be the Vulcanoid….
Maybe I could step in even this would be a boys role?
11111.title: later at school

choices: more about the star trek games as a male charakter
111111.content: It was accepted that I could become Mr. Spock, even I was a girl and even I had blonde hair and no such ears…
111111.title: Mr Spock

choices: more about the star trek games as a male charakter
1111111.content:
My parents wondered why I was refusing to wear dresses or skirts to school. I was kind of ashamed and did not tell them that I was playing a boy’s role in our game at school and also some non human character…
To not worry my parents to much I was wearing skirts and dresses on the weekend when we went to school or were visiting my grandparents
1111111.title: more about the star trek games as a male charakter

choices: how this would look like as a girl version of me
more on our star trek games
1113.content:
time went by and I was now in primary school
The time I was in primary school Star Trek, the original series was aired and popular. My parents especially my Dad allowed me to watch it and I was pretty much a fan of Captain Kirk.
In school in our breaks we played the characters of Star Trek. It was kind of cosplay but did not have costumes or make up, we were kids…. I was of course Captain Kirk leading the team through space and final frontiers where no man or kid has gone before. My best friend Rick was Mr. Spok, even he missed the ears and certainly had red blood like all humans, but anyhow he was our Vulcanoid….
We had some girl, Sheela, who played Uhura and her friend Christine was nurse Chapel.
We were also searching for more friends for Scotty and Bones, and of course Chekov and Sulu, but we were a close group of friends
1113.title: skip to school

11133.content: Some years later I was starting junior high school. I was 13 then I started to show my first interested into getting a girlfriend.
11133.title: another year later

12.content:
101 Dalmatian Street (Weight Gain Inflation & More!) They're putty in your hands, mold them as you hereby see fit.

The Dalmatian Family and animals of Camden Town are perfect examples of cartoon animals characters that you can do anything to.

Do feel free to fatten them up individually or at the same time, inflate them, make them the most disgusting of slobs or not, make them the size of Godzilla or King Kong and have them flatten anything that stands in their path or have them defend their hometown or other city around the world, or make them muscular and good looking.

Have fun with it and don't feel restricted, in other words go nuts and or crazy.

Cartoon Animal Wrestling League. Anthropomorphic cartoon animals from around the world compete in the Cartoon Animal Wrestling League.

And as an added bonus you can insert yourself into the story as an anthropomorphic cartoon animal.
12.title: Cartoon Animal Stories.

13.content:
This is a Taylor William Clark, he's a bully and picks on all the nerds and geeks in school then one day he picks on the wrong person.

He gets kidnapped and turned into the female version of himself then dropped of at his mother's house.

His mother saw and ran outside and found a letter addressed to her about what has happened to her son or daughter as it is now....
13.title: Revenge of the bullied

14.content:
A Familiar Problem:


My name is Max Stone, a short and weak twelve year old boy. I just recently discovered I am a familiar...

In fantasy, a familiar is an animal, likely a cat or crow that possesses unimaginable magical power. While they can not use it, they can grant some or all of it to a witch or her coven to greatly increase their powers.

In my case, I have unimaginable reserves of strength, energy, speed and endurance I cannot access. However, I can grant some or all of these reserves to a person or group I happen to befriend.

I first realized this at the first senior football game of the school year. The football players treated me as one of their own during practice. I came to know them quite well and befriend them. Each member roughed up my hair for luck on their way in to the game as I was their 'towel boy' for that year. They went on to earn a flawless victory, literally plowing through the other team's defenses as if they had become berserkers in combat. I do not know how I knew it was me giving them strength, I just knew.

My only fear was what would happen if anyone found out...
14.title: Story Slot

info.brief_description: A story where everyone can write their own stories
info.description:
This is a meta-document containing many slots for users who might be unable to write their own interactive stories due to lacking a basic membership, for those who have a basic membership and above who don't want to clutter up their portfolio with a dozen stories they'll forget about and eventually delete, or those who might want all of their writings in one convenient place.

I'll try to create as many story slots as I can to include everyone and anyone who wants to add more choices to their chapters can email or PM me to add a request. If you add the story title in the first chapter I'll make changes to the choice to reflect it.
